section.p: The sky is the colour of burning sulphur. Thunder rumbles the heavens, making your crewmen quail. ‘The wrath of the gods is upon us!’ shrieks the bosun. ‘Say your final prayers, lads!’

p.if: If you have the blessing of Alvir and Valmir, which confers Safety from Storms, you can ignore the storm. Cross off your blessing and .

section.p:
Otherwise the storm hits with terrible fury. Great grey waves break across the deck.
